meanings.sent1: After the snowball fight, they needed to rewarm by the fireplace.
meanings.sent2: She rewarming her hands by rubbing them together.
meanings.sent3: The cat kept rewarming itself by sitting on the sunny windowsill.
meanings.sent4: The sun rewarming the earth after a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The soup needed rewarming on the stove to be hot again.

meanings.definition: The act of warming something again.
meanings.sent1: The rewarming of the leftovers made them taste better.
meanings.sent2: He placed the coffee in the microwave for rewarming.
meanings.sent3: The rewarming of the room made everyone feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: The rewarming of the bread in the oven filled the kitchen with a delicious smell.
meanings.sent5: The rewarming of the blankets on a cold night brought comfort.
